alert.note: Alert for Chelan; Okanogan (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 13 at 8:08PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Ongoing snowmelt and additional rainfall from thunderstorms starting as early as Monday will bring additional rises on many rivers and creeks in and near the Cascades... River rises and increased flows will continue as a result of snowmelt. In addition thunderstorms that develop Monday through Thursday will be capable of producing heavy rain which may further accentuate the rising rivers. Isolated thunderstorms may also produce localized debris flows in steep terrain, or flash flooding, especially near burn scars. The Stehekin River is forecast to reach flood stage on Tuesday and the Okanogan River on Wednesday. The Methow and Entiat Rivers are forecast to reach bankfull.
